title: Pregnant women in NC exposed to less secondhand nicotine after ‘smoking ban’

title_detail.value: Pregnant women in NC exposed to less secondhand nicotine after ‘smoking ban’

summary: A new study has found pregnant women experienced less secondhand smoke exposure since the 2009 passage of the ‘smoking ban’ in North Carolina, which outlawed smoking inside public places such as bars and restaurants.

summary_detail.value: A new study has found pregnant women experienced less secondhand smoke exposure since the 2009 passage of the ‘smoking ban’ in North Carolina, which outlawed smoking inside public places such as bars and restaurants.
